name: CONSUL
description: A simple CONSUL demo on Heroku

RAILS_ENV.description: The environment in which the app will be running (production is default).

SEED.description: Yes if wanting to seed test data

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.

MAX_THREADS.description: The maximum amount of threads worker will spawn.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: S3 ID. Required to upload images or docs.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: S3 secret key. Required to upload images or docs.

AWS_S3_HOST_NAME.description: S3 host name. Required to upload images or docs.

AWS_S3_REGION.description: S3 region. Required to upload images or docs.

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: S3 bucket name. Required to upload images or docs.
